participant_1.background:
I am not sure if I am a healthy person, but I know that I am trying my best.
I like to spend my free time building things with my son.
i have a gambling problem.
i would rather read a book than watch a movie.
i ve been in a relationship for 2 years.

participant_2.background:
My biggest fear is that my CD collection will be destroyed.
i do not much like tv.
I am not really concerned with my appearance, as I spend most of my time on the farm.
i am insecure.
i m afraid of clowns.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well, thank you. How are you?
I am doing alright, thanks. What are some of your hobbies?
I like to spend most of my time on the farm. I am not really concerned with my appearance, as I do not get out much.
I see. That sounds like a nice way to relax. What are you most insecure about?
I am insecure about my appearance. I do not like going out in public because I am afraid of people judging me.
I am sure you look fine. There is no need to be insecure about yourself.
Thank you, I appreciate that. What are some of your hobbies?
I like to build things with my son. I also enjoy reading books and watching movies.
That sounds like fun. I have not read a book in a long time. I used to read a lot when I was younger.
You should try reading again. It is a great way to relax and learn new things.
I will try. Thank you for the suggestion.
Yes, I have a dog and a cat.
That sounds nice. I have always wanted a pet, but I am not sure if I have enough time to take care of one.
They are a lot of work, but they are also very rewarding.
I see. I will think about it.
You should. They are great companions.
